DOC.brief_summary: This study execute evaluate outcome quality life , pain , sexuality , pregnancy rate recurrence rate fertility spar multidisciplinary CO2 laser laparoscopic radical excision deep infiltrating colorectal endometriosis bowel resection .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Segmental Bowel Resection Deep Infiltrating Colorectal Endometriosis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients All woman ( n=45 ) undergone fertility spar CO2 laser laparoscopic radical excision deep infiltrating endometriosis bowel resection select retrospectively list patient ( n=more 500 , slightly 50 % endometriosis ) operate Leuven University Fertility Centre ( LUFc ) September 2004 September 2006 . Questionnaires All 45 patient ask complete Oxford Endometriosis Quality Life questionnaire ( 27 ) , sexual activity questionnaire ( 28 ) , visual analogue scale ( VAS ) dysmenorroe , chronic pelvic pain deep dyspareunia , answer question medication fertility , compare status surgery moment evaluation ( December 2008 ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients suffer deep infiltrating endometriosis colorectal extension Who undergo CO2 laser laparoscopic radical excision endometriosis bowel resection perform colorectal surgeon September 2004 July 2006 . Patients without bowel resection
